There are several analytical decisions to be made in the course of performing a meta-analysis, which influence outcomes and conclusions. 

One such decision is which studies to include. 

Here's how to calculate and visualize ALL possible study combinations in #Rstats [THREAD] https://t.co/qkf6EBQEeA

Learn tidymodels in four 1/2-day sessions in August with the virtual NYR conference! 

{parsnip}, {recipes}, {tune} and the rest! Feature engineering! Model optimization! 

No irises, just #rstats
